sentence.Network_en: He is a man of extraordinary vitality, driving ambition and political nous.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个精力非凡、志向远大、政治上很有见识的人。

sentence.Network_en: Gregory'sfather had implanted in him an ambition to obtain an education.
sentence.Network_cn: 格雷戈里的父亲早就向他灌输了要接受教育的志向。

sentence.Network_en: He had nursed an ambition to lead his own big orchestra.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直有一个梦想，希望能指挥一支自己的顶级管弦乐队。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 花语_互动百科 ... 自然（ Nature） 野心（ambition）（ Ambition） 恶意（ EvilIntention）.
翻译中国 ... F:Freedom( 自由) A:Ambition( 雄心) N:Nation( 国家).
新概念英语单词大全_百度文库 ... amber-like a. 琥珀色的 ambition n. 抱负 ambitious a. 野心勃勃的.
William Shakespeare_BBC Chinese ... betrayal 背叛 ambition 雄心, 志气 theatre 剧院.

list.abs: 求前面... ... 15. 狼崽[ wolfling] 16. 狼子野心[ rapacity;aggressive designs of the wolves; wild ambition; wolfish nature].
求十题初中阶段的英语作文题_百度知道 ... Things I hate to do 我讨厌做得事情 My ambition (理想) 我的理想 my family 我的家庭.
She has no personal ambition ., 她没有个人野心.
So North Korea ' s nuclear ambitions are creating problems for China ., 因此朝鲜的核野心给中国带来问题.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : via Old French from Latin ambitio(n-), from ambire 'go around (canvassing for votes')

entry.def: If you have an ambition to do or achieve something, you want very much to do it or achieve it.

example.ex: His ambition is to sail round the world...
He harboured ambitions of becoming a Tory MP.
example.tran: 他梦想成为托利党下院议员。

entry.def: Ambition is the desire to be successful, rich, or powerful.

example.ex: Even when I was young I never had any ambition.
example.tran: 即使是年轻时，我也从没有什么雄心壮志。
既野心勃勃又冷酷无情

sentences.sentence: "his ambition is to own his own business"

auth_sentence.content: People my age were fearless and full of ambition.
auth_sentence.res_content: People my age were fearless and full of ambition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People my age were fearless and full of ambition.

auth_sentence.content: Under the surface burns a fierce ambition to succeed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Under the surface burns a fierce ambition to succeed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Under the surface burns a fierce ambition to succeed.

auth_sentence.content: I will never care three flocks for his ambition.
auth_sentence.res_content: I will never care three flocks for his ambition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I will never care three flocks for his ambition.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有抱负的,雄心勃勃的;有野心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ambition怠鷄dj.有抱负的,雄心勃勃的;有野心的
in进+it行走+iative=ive……的→走进的→开始的
itiner=it变体+ant……的→走的→走来走去的
sed=se分开+it走+ious……的→分开走的→煽动叛乱的
trans变换+it走+ory……的→你走他来→短暂的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 对[成功,权力等]的强烈欲望,野心;雄心
stems_affixes.word_buile: amb大+it行走+ion表名词→走大步,雄心
in进+it行走+iative=ive……的→走进的→开始的
itiner=it变体+ary表名词→n.行程表,旅行路线
sed=se分开+it走+ion表名词→分开走→煽动叛乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通过,通行,中转,输送,运送
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换+it行走→n.通过,通行,中转,输送,运送
trans变换+it行走+ion表名词→交接过程[it可以理解为走的过程]→过渡

stems_affixes.value_cn: 开始,创始,发动;启蒙,使入门;引入
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进+it行走+iate表动词→走进→开始

Sentence.sentence: They resonated(共鸣) with optimism and ambition in much the same way as the most famous dream speech of all, delivered by Martin Luther King Jr.
They can only be solved by people with optimism and ambition
Behind the differences in sex, skin tones and mother tongues, there are common attitudes, expectations and ambitions which risk creating a set of clones among the business leaders of the future.

means.word_mean: 抱负, 雄心, 野心

sentences.en: The big house on the hill is my ambition.
sentences.cn: 山上那所大房子是我所企望得到的。

jushi.english: The big house on the hill is my ambition.
jushi.chinese: 小山上那所大房子是我所企望得到的。

jushi.english: She has great ambitions but little talent.
He attributes his failure to a lack of ambition.
jushi.chinese: 他把自己的失败归因于缺少抱负。
